::Battera:;

She got up and walked into the base.  She walked down the hall, with 
her head lowered, and walked into  her room.  She sat down in her 
chair and stared at the wall.  She was in shock.  Her friend, whom 
had given her the inspired her to take up the peace talk mission, had 
just put the whole responcability of the talks on her.  She didn't 
even realize she was barely breathing.  She knew nothing about 
organizing such talks.  She knew nothing about getting the leaders to 
listen to each other.  She knew nothing about running an embassy and 
such.  She just stared at the wall in shock and horror. In one cruel 
twist of fate, she saw her dreams fall and dissappear in front of 
her.
